verses.verse: And it came to pass, when men <S%H120><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8689><s%> to multiply <S%H7231><s%> <S%H8800><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>, and daughters <S%H1323><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8795><s%> unto them,

That the sons <S%H1121><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> that they <S%H2007><s%> were fair <S%H2896><s%>; and they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them wives <S%H802><s%> of all which they chose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, My spirit <S%H7307><s%> shall not always <S%H5769><s%> strive <S%H1777><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with man <S%H120><s%>, for that he also <S%H1571><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H7683><s%> <S%H8800><s%> is flesh <S%H1320><s%>: yet his days <S%H3117><s%> shall be an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

There were giants <S%H5303><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> in those days <S%H3117><s%>; and also after <S%H310><s%> that <S%H3651><s%>, when <S%H834><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, and they bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> children to them, the same <S%H1992><s%> became mighty men <S%H1368><s%> which were of old <S%H5769><s%>, men <S%H582><s%> of renown <S%H8034><s%>.

And GOD <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> was great <S%H7227><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>, and that every imagination <S%H3336><s%> of the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of his heart <S%H3820><s%> was only <S%H7535><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> continually <S%H3117><s%>.

And it repented <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8735><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> that he had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> man <S%H120><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>, and it grieved <S%H6087><s%> <S%H8691><s%> him at <S%H413><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I will destroy <S%H4229><s%> <S%H8799><s%> man <S%H120><s%> whom I have created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>; both man <S%H120><s%>, and <S%H5704><s%> beast <S%H929><s%>, and the creeping thing <S%H7431><s%>, and the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%>; for it repenteth <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8738><s%> me that I have made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them.
But Noach <S%H5146><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

These are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Noach <S%H5146><s%>: Noach <S%H5146><s%> was a just <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H376><s%> and perfect <S%H8549><s%> in his generations <S%H1755><s%>, and Noach <S%H5146><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8694><s%> with 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.
And Noach <S%H5146><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, Shem <S%H8035><s%>, Ham <S%H2526><s%>, and Yefet <S%H3315><s%>.

The earth <S%H776><s%> also was corrupt <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8735><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with violence <S%H2555><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, and, behold, it was corrupt <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8738><s%>; for all flesh <S%H1320><s%> had corrupted <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Noach <S%H5146><s%>, The end <S%H7093><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before me <S%H6440><s%>; for the earth <S%H776><s%> is filled with <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> violence <S%H2555><s%> through them <S%H6440><s%>; and, behold, I will destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8688><s%> them with <S%H854><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thee an ark <S%H8392><s%> of gopher <S%H1613><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>; rooms <S%H7064><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in <S%H854><s%> the ark <S%H8392><s%>, and shalt pitch <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it within <S%H1004><s%> and without <S%H2351><s%> with pitch <S%H3724><s%>.

And this is the fashion which thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it of: The length <S%H753><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%> shall be three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of it fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the height <S%H6967><s%> of it thirty <S%H7970><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

A window <S%H6672><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the ark <S%H8392><s%>, and in a cubit <S%H520><s%> shalt thou finish <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it above <S%H4605><s%>; and the door <S%H6607><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%> shalt thou set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the side thereof <S%H6654><s%>; with lower <S%H8482><s%>, second <S%H8145><s%>, and third <S%H7992><s%> stories shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.

And, behold <S%H2009><s%>, I <S%H589><s%>, even I, do bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8688><s%> a flood <S%H3999><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, to destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8763><s%> all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, wherein is the breath <S%H7307><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>, from under <S%H8478><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%>; and every thing <S%H3605><s%> that is in the earth <S%H776><s%> shall die <S%H1478><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

But with thee will I establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>; and thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the ark <S%H8392><s%>, thou <S%H859><s%>, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%>, and thy wife <S%H802><s%>, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> ' wives <S%H802><s%> with thee.

And of every living thing <S%H2416><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> of every sort shalt thou bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> into the ark <S%H8392><s%>, to keep them alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8687><s%> with thee; they shall be male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%>.

Of fowls <S%H5775><s%> after their kind <S%H4327><s%>, and of cattle <S%H929><s%> after their kind <S%H4327><s%>, of every creeping thing <S%H7431><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> of every sort shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee, to keep them alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8687><s%>.

And take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou unto thee of all food <S%H3978><s%> that is eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and thou shalt gather <S%H622><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it to thee; and it shall be for food <S%H402><s%> for thee, and for them.
Thus did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Noach <S%H5146><s%>; according to all that 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> him, so did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he.
